CONGRATULATIONS
Based on your performance as a BlueWave Partner and your recently signed Community Solar SSA, we would like to welcome you to our new, top-tier "Loyal Blue" rewards program.
You already know the benefits of Community Solar:
Re-Connect with leads who did not follow through with rooftop installations Offer "one-stop-solar" for new leads Top-off eligible solar loan customers for 100% solar power Earn up to $1,500 in commission per lead closed
Check out your Additional Loyal Blue Benefits:
Event Sponsorship: Co-Exhibiting at key industry events Exclusive Sales Perks: Think tickets to March Madness 2018 Training: Subsidies available for your team And more..!
Psyched? Talk to your BlueWave partner about how BlueWave can best support your future growth and customer sales.
Thanks for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
General Partner Support 888-817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com Partner Support is available 8AM - 8PM EST
